EXAMPLE THM
HYPOTHESES: 
POINT A B C D E F
QUADRANGLE D C B A
ANGLE_BISECTOR E A B C
ON_LINE E A D
ANGLE_BISECTOR F A D C
ON_LINE F B C
EQANGLE A B C A D C
EQANGLE F D E B E A
SHOW: PARALLEL B C A D
A(258.000000000000000+7,254.000000000000000-24)  B(309.000000000000000+7,120.000000000000000-24)  C(543.000000000000000+7,120.000000000000000-24)  D(509.000000000000000+7,254.000000000000000-24)  E(401.377125093231000+7,254.000000000000000-24)  
F(404.753842729716300+7,120.000000000000000-24)
